name: amp_wei_rival_07_02
text: This is gonna be awkward when we're back home, isn't it.
text_simple: this is gonna be awkward when were back home isnt it

name: amp_wei_rival_239
text: Wow, killing that kid was a lot less emotionally stressful than I thought it'd be.
text_simple: wow killing that kid was a lot less emotionally stressful than i thought itd be

name: amp_wei_rival_240
text: It's past your bed time, kid.
text_simple: its past your bed time kid

name: amp_wei_rival_305
text: I trust I've made myself clear.
text_simple: i trust ive made myself clear

name: amp_wei_ally_239
text: Alright kid, if you ask nicely I'll let you be my ward.
text_simple: alright kid if you ask nicely ill let you be my ward

name: amp_wei_ally_240
text: Stick with me kid, I won't let them hurt you.
text_simple: stick with me kid i wont let them hurt you

name: amp_wei_ally_301
text: Of course I think it's a sad story. But that doesn't take away from the horrible things you've done.
text_simple: of course i think its a sad story but that doesnt take away from the horrible things youve done

name: amp_wei_ally_303_02
text: So I had an idea for like, an obstacle course where the obstacles try to kill you.
text_simple: so i had an idea for like an obstacle course where the obstacles try to kill you

name: amp_wei_shitwiz_02
text: Do you even need to qualify the word wizard with another pejorative?
text_simple: do you even need to qualify the word wizard with another pejorative

name: amp_wei_wheel_deny_01
text: Why would you think that's a good idea?!
text_simple: why would you think thats a good idea

name: amp_wei_wheel_deny_02
text: Yep. The world is a messed up place...
text_simple: yep the world is a messed up place

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_04
text: I always leave the hellbear cubs alone. They're pretty cute and, ya know, I'll be back this way again...
text_simple: i always leave the hellbear cubs alone theyre pretty cute and ya know ill be back this way again

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_08
text: You might not guess it, but I didn't spend much time around other kids.
text_simple: you might not guess it but i didnt spend much time around other kids

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_12
text: I don't hate you. But that doesn't mean you're getting out of here alive.
text_simple: i dont hate you but that doesnt mean youre getting out of here alive

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_14
text: I wouldn't call that a win for you.
text_simple: i wouldnt call that a win for you

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_18
text: Did you hear the one about how MAGIC SUCKS!
text_simple: did you hear the one about how magic sucks

name: amp_wei_wheel_all_19
text: Crushing dreams is kind of my job.
text_simple: crushing dreams is kind of my job
